casebody.data:
Bigelow, Appellee, v. American Family Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Bigelow v. Am. Family Ins. Co., 145 Ohio St.3d 488, 2016-Ohio-1135.]

(No. 2014-1413 Submitted January 6, 2016 Decided March 23, 2016.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is vacated, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for application of Dillon v. Farmers Ins. of Columbus, Inc., 145 Ohio St.3d 133, 2015-Ohio-5407, 47 N.E.3d 794.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Kennedy, and French, JJ., concur. O’Neill, J., dissents. *489Pomerene, Burns & Skelton and James R. Skelton, for appellee. Frost & Maddox Co., L.P.A., and Mark S. Maddox, for appellant.
